text:
Anyone read code on a device other than monitor (e.g. Kindle, iPad, etc) ? Is it helpful for reading (assuming you’re not programming) ?

I’ve realized I spend a lot of time looking at code on my phone and it’s an absolutely garbage habit for the eyes.

elements.text:

text: Just straight up looking at the source 100% of the time? I do a lot of GitHub review on my iPad with my morning coffee. Pretty pleasurable experience.
